explanation: [0-0] In a blue room, a man in an orange vest sits at a mottled gray table with some light yellow and pink marshmallows on it. He is holding a drill in his left hand, with a cylindrical marshmallow stuck on it. In his right hand, he holds a lit lighter, carefully toasting the marshmallow. To his right is a beige wooden door.

[0-3] While toasting the marshmallow, he turns his head to look to the left, then continues toasting until it's charred. He then turns off the lighter, places both the lighter and drill on the table, and gets up, walking off-screen to the left. The marshmallow on the drill is now emitting red flames.
